name: tm43
effect: Teaches Secret Power to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flame Charge to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Secret Power Gen II: Detect Gen I: Sky Attack)

flavor_text.sun-moon: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
